TopicTitle: Odd issue and intolerable framerate during tutorial missions in 1.0.2

Articles.Content:
I thought I'd try some of the tutorials after launch and have been getting some weird issues:

1. Sometimes when I try to launch a tutorial mission that should start in space the game loads above Kerbin but there is no ship to control! The camera is stuck with nothing to focus on and no controls seem responsive. This happens maybe half of the time - if I quit and then launch the tutorial again chances are it will load properly and the ship will be there.
2. My framerate during tutorial missions is extremely inconsistent, but in a consistent way. If I start the docking tutorial for example and it loads correctly then my framerate is fine while looking at my ship, but then when I bring up the map screen it plummets to a slideshow. Closing the map screen after this point does not help - my framerate will still be bad in ship view. If I fight through this and do what the tutorial text tells me (set another ship as my target) then my framerate instantly smooths out again, but will plummet later on when I have to burn towards my point of intersection.

I've dabbled in Sandbox mode as well but have so far had smooth framerates both in ship view and map view, so it seems to be a problem with the tutorials.
